subject: Physical Fitness
title: ATP: The Energy Currency
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on ATP: The Energy Currency.

hook.text: Every muscle contraction costs one molecule: ATP. Without it, you can't blink, breathe, or step.

buildup.text: Your body stores only about 80 grams of ATP ‚Äî enough for roughly 2‚Äì3 seconds of all-out effort.

discovery.text: So the body recycles it constantly. You remake your entire body weight in ATP every single day.

twist.text: ATP can't be stored in bulk or eaten directly. Every cell must manufacture its own, on demand.

climax.text: Three energy systems recycle ATP at different speeds. Which fires depends on effort intensity.

punchline.text: One molecule runs your body. It just recycles a trillion times.
